text: A life simulation game is a kind of simulation game where the player takes on a god-like perspective of the game.Handbook of Research on Improving Learning and Motivation through Educational Games, ed. Felicia, Patrick (Hershey PA: Information Science Reference, 2011), p. 668 Unlike some other simulation games, which progress at the player's speed, a life simulation game continues automatically. SimAnimals is an example of a life simulation game.Winifred Phillips, A Composer's Guide to Game Music (London; New York: MIT Press, 2014), p. 92 == References == Category:Video game genres
title: Life simulation game
